text: Stephen McNeil (born November 10, 1964) is a Canadian politician. He was the 28th Premier of Nova Scotia from October 22, 2013 until February 23, 2021. He also represented the riding of Annapolis in the Nova Scotia House of Assembly from 2003 until 2021 and was the leader of the Nova Scotia Liberal Party from 2007 until 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== * Members of the Nova Scotia Legislative Assembly * Liberal caucus profile * Canadian Encyclopedia entry on Stephen McNeil Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of Nova Scotia
title: Stephen McNeil
